element.name: tcustomframe.frameimage_list
element.short: Defines a group of 8 images in a TImageList used for theming

descr.p: . 4 for the corners and 4 stretched images for the edges. Images are numbered 0 to 7, and used in a counter-clockwise order, starting from the top-left.
descr.pre:
0 = topleft, 1 = left, 2 = bottomleft, 3 = bottom, 4 = bottomright, 5 = right, 6 = topright, 7 = top
0 - 7 - 6 | | 1 5 | | 2 - 3 - 4
descr.p: Please see apps/facedomo tstringedit8 for an example.
